text: How competent, if at all, would you say you are in general with {{MULTI}} in your academic writing (i.e., for school)?

multi.text: How competent, if at all, would you say you are in general with Meeting genre expectations in your academic writing (i.e., for school)?
multi.hover: e.g., knowing when to argue, analyze, describe, etc.; using a central idea in a paper; providing logical transitions between sections

multi.text: How competent, if at all, would you say you are in general with Revising effectively in your academic writing (i.e., for school)?
multi.hover: e.g., responding to feedback from others about the content of your drafts

multi.text: How competent, if at all, would you say you are in general with Making and supporting a point in your academic writing (i.e., for school)?
multi.hover: e.g., researching a topic, developing an argument, and organizing appropriate evidence and relevant supporting details

multi.text: How competent, if at all, would you say you are in general with Evaluating and synthesizing information in your academic writing (i.e., for school)?
multi.hover: i.e., effectively and coherently incorporating appropriate evidence and relevant research into your writing

multi.text: How competent, if at all, would you say you are in general with Analyzing information in your academic writing (i.e., for school)?
multi.hover: i.e., understanding how meaning is made, and how and why it is communicated

multi.text: How competent, if at all, would you say you are in general with Addressing audience needs and expectations in your academic writing (i.e., for school)?
multi.hover: i.e., using appropriate strategies and style to achieve your desired effect

multi.text: How competent, if at all, would you say you are in general with Editing in your academic writing (i.e., for school)?
multi.hover: e.g., identifying and correcting grammatical errors

multi.text: How competent, if at all, would you say you are in general with Identifying purpose and context in your academic writing (i.e., for school)?
multi.hover: i.e., clarifying to yourself and to readers what your intentions are and why they're relevant

multi.text: How competent, if at all, would you say you are in general with Working effectively and appropriately with various media in your academic writing (i.e., for school)?
multi.hover: e.g., researching and composing in appropriate modes, such as alphabetic, visual, audio
